Desc.entry: A City Council adventure playground administered by Activity Sheffield for children aged 5-14 years. Children aged under 8 years must be accompanied. The adventure playground has a large outdoor area with many structures which are designed to incorporate an element of risk. The structures are designed to assist children to develop co-ordination and balance. The site also has an indoor area.

ContactName.entry: Richard Fowler/Graham Kay, Play Development Officer
